Articles.Content:
A message from Cerverus Kerman,before launch to his Mission!!!

http://i.imgur.com/T5Z67Ty.jpg

No problems! Thank you for your help!

Excuse me Skully Kerman is that an Iridium tinted visor you are wearing?

Also going to be available in tinted.

Hi there Green Skull. I love these suits they are awesome.

I'm working on some Star Trek textures for my kerbals and was wondering if you would be interested in making some suits/uniforms to match. any help or advice would be greatly appreciated

check out my textures here

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/60961-0-23-TextureReplacer-1-2-%2811-3-2014%29-Visor-reflections%21?p=1019711&viewfull=1#post1019711

Hi there Green Skull. I love these suits they are awesome.

I'm working on some Star Trek textures for my kerbals and was wondering if you would be interested in making some suits/uniforms to match. any help or advice would be greatly appreciated

check out my textures here

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/60961-0-23-TextureReplacer-1-2-%2811-3-2014%29-Visor-reflections%21?p=1019711&viewfull=1#post1019711

Excellent! I was planning on star trek suits so now I have to make them! Could I include the heads in my packs?

Excellent! I was planning on star trek suits so now I have to make them! Could I include the heads in my packs?

glad you like them.

you are more than welcome to include my heads in your packs as long as you credit me with their making

i still need to do a few minor tweaks on a couple of them and i will be adding more characters to the line-up very soon.

(also, if you have any ideas on how to tackle the issue of geordi la`forge`s visor im more than open to suggestions)

glad you like them.

you are more than welcome to include my heads in your packs as long as you credit me with their making

i still need to do a few minor tweaks on a couple of them and i will be adding more characters to the line-up very soon.

(also, if you have any ideas on how to tackle the issue of geordi la`forge`s visor im more than open to suggestions)

I will 100% give you the credit for your work same as I do everybody else! You did it you take the credit!

The la forge visor issue. I have toyed with trying to make glasses on some kerbal heads but my first attempt looked flat and kind of comedy drawn on then I got distracted by other things. The problem here is that all though the texture on the outside changes, the frame underneath the model stays the same. On paper it looks like la forges visor - in reality it looks like his eyes are popping through it. I'm sure I have seen him in episodes without his visor - sometimes with LED's stuck to the side of his head and in episodes or a film where he didn't have it.

LED geordi

Retinal implants la forge aka fancy contact lenses
Also some more awesome happened when the Chrome Iridium visor idea turned out like this...

I will 100% give you the credit for your work same as I do everybody else! You did it you take the credit!

The la forge visor issue. I have toyed with trying to make glasses on some kerbal heads but my first attempt looked flat and kind of comedy drawn on then I got distracted by other things. The problem here is that all though the texture on the outside changes, the frame underneath the model stays the same. On paper it looks like la forges visor - in reality it looks like his eyes are popping through it. I'm sure I have seen him in episodes without his visor - sometimes with LED's stuck to the side of his head and in episodes or a film where he didn't have it.

Wonderful! I assumed you would I just thought it a good idea to ask. better safe than sorry. I will attempt to e-mail you the heads I have so far.

thanks for the reference images, using the implants instead of the visor is a great idea!
Is it to late to be a beta tester?

Is it to late to be a beta tester?

Currently the released packs are in beta, but no its not too late to get on the list, FASA or koviet union?

For everyone else there are 2 slots available...

Current list of testers is:

CERVERUS - Koviet Union

- Koviet Union

drtedastro - KSP

Sippyfrog - KSP

Airouge - Kerbal States

likke_A_boss - Kerbal States

Space_Kraken - FASA

- FASA

Edited March 14, 2014 by Green Skull

Can I request the space suit from Sunshine?

I love the movie Sunshine and would like the space suit for when I recreate the space mission.

Edited March 13, 2014 by GoldForest

Can I request the space suit from Sunshine?

LOL, i laughed at the bacon man that was on the first Icarus mission.

Can I request the space suit from Sunshine?

http://somuchtoseesomuchtodo.files.wordpress.com/2012/02/full-suit.jpg

http://www.yourprops.com/movieprops/original/yp_52b782fd7a9a67.67968247/Sunshine-Icarus-II-Spacesuit-Model-2.jpg

I love the movie Sunshine and would like the space suit for when I recreate the space mission.

I've been waiting for this one to come up lol. I can't do much about the over all shape. This maybe a bit down the road - not this week or next as I have a ton to do all ready, but I think so ok? Same goes for the BSG reboot suits and the Last Star fighter suit.

LOL, i laughed at the bacon man that was on the first Icarus mission.

There are no promises that your kerbal won't turn into bacon if he goes too close to the sun while wearing it...

LOL, i laughed at the bacon man that was on the first Icarus mission.

I thought he was creepy as heck. His skin is all burned off, or burned off in most places. He became too involved with religion, as far as to kill people and say God didn't want them to complete their mission. If God didn't want them to complete it, he wouldn't have given them the technology to save themselves.

I've been waiting for this one to come up lol. I can't do much about the over all shape. This maybe a bit down the road - not this week or next as I have a ton to do all ready, but I think so ok? Same goes for the BSG reboot suits and the Last Star fighter suit.

I don't care about shape right now, I just want the color and design scheme.

Edited March 13, 2014 by GoldForest

I don't care about shape right now, I just want the color and design scheme.

Ok. I should be able to get a slot in the visor too but I'm not promising.

Ok. I should be able to get a slot in the visor too but I'm not promising.

Do what you can, your only human

SPUD-L1Z,landed at Minmus (moon of Kerbin)

Soyuz TMA 112,cosmonaut,approach Cerverus for recovery and transfer to Soyuz,for re entry to atmosphere of Kerbin...back to "home".

SPUD-L1Z,landed at Minmus (moon of Kerbin)

http://i.imgur.com/2UG69yh.jpg

Soyuz TMA 112,cosmonaut,approach Cerverus for recovery and transfer to Soyuz,for re entry to atmosphere of Kerbin...back to "home".

http://i.imgur.com/1GkL8iS.jpg

You will make people jealous of your stealth suit!

Done. Welcome aboard!

Hey Green Skull? Any chance you can make me a custom suit based on the Kerbal States suits with my logo? (if the one I linked is too small PM me and i'll get you the original 2000x2000 version for your own resizing) I was looking to have the Kerbal States white EVA suits and dark orange IVA suits done where one shoulder has flag, and another the logo and then If you could do the helmet with the flags on sides and my logo on back that'd be amazing!

Keep it cool!

Hey Green Skull? Any chance you can make me a custom suit based on the Kerbal States suits with my logo? (if the one I linked is too small PM me and i'll get you the original 2000x2000 version for your own resizing) I was looking to have the Kerbal States white EVA suits and dark orange IVA suits done where one shoulder has flag, and another the logo and then If you could do the helmet with the flags on sides and my logo on back that'd be amazing!

Keep it cool!

Yeah ok not a problem. Will do it for you tommorow just finishing uploading new beta version 0.36 with visor fix and a couple of new visor colours to check out

You will make people jealous of your stealth suit!

I am happy i have this awesome suit...i create to my Koviet Space Program with name Cerverus Kerman,and only this character wear this suit!

He is the top test pilot-cosmonaut!!!

I am so busy and tired today,but the weekend,i will do more missions!
